name: Ring Kings: Boxing Manager Game
blurb: A detailed Boxing Manager/Trainer Game. Train and Tailor fight plans, take on contenders lead your boxers to titles. Be a RING KING!

rewards.reward: No Reward

HALL OF FAME PLEDGE: (approx $4,557)\r\nAll rewards from HEAVYWEIGHT pledge + GOLD Level ACCESS, where you will be able to participate in conference calls with the development team to give your ideas. Upon every load and exit of the game. ALSO INCLUDES everything else from the previous tiers

GREATEST OF ALL TIME PLEDGE: (approx $7,552)\r\nAll rewards from HALL OF FAME pledge + NAMED AS EXECUTIVE PRODUCER ON THE RING KINGS CREDITS on Back of game artwork and on game opening and closing.
